speaker: trump
text: So, class, what's the big deal about a blockchain server?  It's not just some fancy server, you know.

speaker: elon
text: It's like, a digital ledger, but everyone has a copy, right?  So, it's super secure.  Like, totally unhackable!  Believe me.

speaker: trump
text: Wrong, Donald.  It's decentralized,  meaning copies are spread across many servers.  Think of it like having a secret recipe, not just one copy in one kitchen, but a hundred.  If someone tries to change one copy...

speaker: elon
text: They'd have to change them ALL!  Huge!  Like, the biggest, most beautiful, unhackable ledger ever made.  So, it's better than my tax returns, right?

speaker: trump
text: Exactly, but also incredibly complex to maintain.  A full node has the whole history, like a giant library.  A light node just has the headings.

speaker: elon
text: So a light node is like...a small library, with just the titles?  Sounds fake news to me.  Very sad.  But bigly efficient, right?  The best efficiency!
